name: Valan International Cargo Charter SA (Pty) Ltd
about:
Valan International Cargo Charter SA (Pty) Ltd is not a flying school, but rather a certified operator specializing in air carriage services. Here is a description tailored to their actual operations:

Valan International Cargo Charter SA (Pty) Ltd is a certified operator providing specialized air carriage services. We utilize Antonov An-26 aircraft and Mi-8 MTV-1 helicopters to transport cargo and service personnel for corporate customers. Our operations comply with the stringent requirements of civil aviation regulations, ensuring safety and reliability. With a strong focus on customer needs, we offer efficient and secure air transport solutions globally. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction drives our operations every day.
services: ["Airframe General\nAntonov AN -32B Instruments\nGas Turbine Engine General"]
